qas.question: What has been heavily restricted in Norfolk Island, until recently?
When were the immigration protocols relaxed in Norfolk Island?
What aided in the relaxation of immigration protocols to Norfolk Island?

answers.text: an Unrestricted Entry Permit for all Australian and New Zealand citizens

qas.question: What must Australian and New Zealand citizens do in order to apply for residency in Norfolk Island?

answers.text: pass a police check and be able to pay into the local health scheme

qas.question: When will the Australian migration system replace Norfolk Island's immigration policies?
What has been heavily encouraged in Norfolk Island, until recently?
When were the immigration protocols made more strict in Norfolk Island?

plausible_answers.text: an Unrestricted Entry Permit for all Australian and New Zealand citizens

qas.question: What damaged the relaxation of immigration protocols to Norfolk Island?

plausible_answers.text: pass a police check and be able to pay into the local health scheme

qas.question: What must Australian and New Zealand citizens avoid in order to apply for residency in Norfolk Island?
When will the Russian migration system replace Norfolk Island's immigration policies?

context: The island is subject to separate immigration controls from the remainder of Australia. Until recently <a0_0><b5_0>immigration<b5_0/><a0_0/> to Norfolk Island even by other Australian citizens was heavily restricted. In <a1_0><b6_0>2012<b6_0/><a1_0/>, immigration controls were relaxed with the introduction of <a2_0><b7_0>an Unrestricted Entry Permit for all Australian and New Zealand citizens<b7_0/><a2_0/> upon arrival and the option to apply for residency; the only criteria are to <a3_0><b8_0>pass a police check and be able to pay into the local health scheme<b8_0/><a3_0/>. From <a4_0><b9_0>1 July 2016<b9_0/><a4_0/>, the Australian migration system will replace the immigration arrangements currently maintained by the Norfolk Island Government.
